scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescipt-five-sdk && tns plugin ../src && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-ng.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo-ng.android: npm run ngc && npm run pack && cd ../demo-angular && (npm uninstall nativescript-five-sdk ; npm i ../publish/package/*.tgz) && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo-ng.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-five-sdk && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-five-sdk && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-ng.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
